long_description: Perfect for international trips, the Victorinox RFID Travel wallet guards your credit cards, personal information and travel documents from identity thieves with external scanning devices. RFID (radio frequency identification) protection technology safeguards personal data stored on RFID microchips in passports, credit cards, and ID cards. Several zippered pockets store passport, tickets, coins and most sizes of currency. RFID Travel wallet can be worn around the neck with the soft, adjustable lanyard or around the waist with the belt attachment.
short_description: Perfect for international trips, the Victorinox RFID Travel wallet guards your credit cards, personal information and travel documents from identity thieves with external scanning devices.
